enchantment.description: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest.

calculation.description: Which number to compare - either the `sum` of levels of this enchantment on all of the player's equipment, or the `max` level of this enchantment on any of the player's equipment.
calculation.markdownDescription: Which number to compare - either the `sum` of levels of this enchantment on all of the player's equipment, or the `max` level of this enchantment on any of the player's equipment.

comparison.description: How the enchantment level should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the enchantment level should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value to compare the enchantment level to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value to compare the enchantment level to.
